attributes.action: Install drug test machines downstream of the toilets in Parliament
attributes.background: Drug use can be detected in urine samples. To prove that all current politicians are pure and drug free, install test gear downstream of the toilets in Parliament and publish the results weekly on a public site.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264011
